bike.description: Jamis Road Dyad Plus T700/FRP Monocoque Carbon Fiber Frame, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, formed top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO386 carbon BB shell, ACE internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, rider tuned twin seat stays with spoiler bridge, oversized asymmetrical chainstays with direct mount brakes, carbon drop outs with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.
bike.paint_description: Carbon Victory Red or Carbon/Pure Lime

components.description: Jamis Road carbon composite fork, FEA optimized Near Net SPV molding process, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
FSA integrated, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Mavic CXP-22 rims with CNC sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano 105 RD-5700 rear and 105 FD-5700 braze-on
FSA EVO PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG EVO adaptors
Tektro T740R direct mount rear and R540 forged alloy dual pivot front calipers with cartridge pads and Shimano 105 ST-5700 STI brake levers
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Open with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
